Package boundedBuffer

An implementation of bounded buffers using semaphores to protect buffer access.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Factory<T>
    Factories make things.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBuffer<T>
    An implementation of buffers using semaphores to protect access to the buffer.
    Buffer<T>
    Completes the implementation of buffers in AbstractBuffer, implementing the Buffer.put(Object) and Buffer.get() methods.
    BufferSystem
    Sets up and runs a buffer, producer and consumer.
    Consumer<T>
    A simple consumer class.
    IntegerFactory
    A Factory that builds Integers.
    Producer<T>
    A simple producer class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BufferError
    A simple buffer error class.

Package boundedBuffer Description

An implementation of bounded buffers using semaphores to protect buffer access.
Version:
January 2020
Author:
Hugh Osborne
